data.lyric:
[ti:Home]
[ar:ThimLife/Bibiane Z]
[al:Home]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Home - ThimLife/Bibiane Z
[00:34.52]I'm looking for a place I can come my home my home wow
[00:41.38]
[00:42.09]Looking for a place where I belong belong wow
[00:48.79]
[00:49.61]Maybe I fall or maybe I drown again and love again wow
[00:56.41]
[00:57.09]Maybe I fall or maybe I drown again and pain again wow
[01:04.73]Even if the sky is falling down falling down I would search for you
[01:12.09]Even if the sky is falling down falling down I won't give up on you
[01:18.90]
[01:32.23]I won't give up on you
[01:36.99]
[01:51.41]I'm looking for a place that can be myself myself wow
[01:58.29]
[01:59.06]Looking for a place where I feel safe again feel safe again wow
[02:05.48]
[02:06.47]Maybe I fall or maybe I lose again this faith again wow
[02:13.06]
[02:14.00]Maybe I fall or maybe I doubt again alone again wow
[02:20.77]
[02:21.52]Even if the sky is falling down falling down I would search for you
[02:29.01]Even if the sky is falling down falling down I won't give up on you
[02:35.66]
[02:37.93]I won't give up on you
[02:39.31]
[02:41.64]I won't give up on you
[02:44.25]
[02:45.43]I won't give up on you
[02:47.26]
[02:49.07]I won't give up on you
data.trans:
[ti:]
[ar:ThimLife/Bibiane Z]
[al:Home]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:34.52]我一直寻寻觅觅 想找到一个如家般温暖的地方
[00:41.38]
[00:42.09]想找到我的归属之地
[00:48.79]
[00:49.61]我或许会意志消沉 或会再次陷入爱恋 无法自拔
[00:56.41]
[00:57.09]我或许会意志消沉 或会再次陷入爱恋 再次心痛不已
[01:04.73]即使天崩地裂 天崩地裂 我依然会将你寻找
[01:12.09]即使天崩地裂 天崩地裂  我依然不会放弃追寻你
[01:18.90]
[01:32.23]我不会放弃追寻你
[01:36.99]
[01:51.41]我想找一片能够独善其身的乐土
[01:58.29]
[01:59.06]找寻一个让我宁静心安的地方 让我宁静心安的地方
[02:05.48]
[02:06.47]我或许会意志消沉 迷失方向 失去信仰
[02:13.06]
[02:14.00]我或许会意志消沉 心生疑惑 再次变成孤身一人
[02:20.77]
[02:21.52]即使天崩地裂 天崩地裂 我依然会将你寻找
[02:29.01]即使天崩地裂 天崩地裂  我依然不会放弃追寻你
[02:35.66]
[02:37.92]我不会放弃追寻你
[02:39.31]
[02:41.64]我不会放弃追寻你
[02:44.25]
[02:45.43]我不会放弃追寻你
[02:47.26]
[02:49.07]我不会放弃追寻你
